Class CashierHeaderController

java.lang.Object
com.group18.controller.cashier.sharedComponents.CashierHeaderController
public class CashierHeaderController extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling the cashier header section in the cashier interface. This includes displaying the current time, cashier's name, role, and handling the logout functionality.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the controller by setting up the clock and the user DAO.

    • setMainController

      public void setMainController(CashierController controller)
      Sets the main controller for the header, allowing access to the cashier's information.
      Parameters:
      controller - The main controller of the cashier interface.

    • getValidUser

      public void getValidUser(User user)
      Validates and sets the current cashier from a given user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to validate and set as the current cashier.

    • initializeUserInfoAfterControllerSet

      private void initializeUserInfoAfterControllerSet()
      Initializes user information after the main controller is set. This ensures that the current cashier's information is populated correctly.

    • initializeUserInfo

      private void initializeUserInfo()
      Initializes and populates the cashier's information in the UI, such as the cashier's full name and role.

    • initializeClock

      private void initializeClock()
      Initializes the clock to display the current time in the format HH:mm:ss. The clock updates every second.

    • handleLogout

      private void handleLogout()
      Handles the logout action. This method stops the clock, clears persistent customer details, and redirects to the login screen.

    • showError

      private void showError(String title, String content)
      Displays an error alert with a given title and content.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the error alert.
      content - The content/message of the error alert.
